record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - January 22, 2008)

[Page: H387]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members in this body may have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material on the subject of this Special Order today.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Minnesota?
